pkgmetadata.longdescription:
A clean, simple GTK/XFCE theme for easy and focused computing. Originally developed for dogfooding, the theme aims to be simple in both design and implementation while keeping a distinctly Unix-like aesthetic ...with some modern quality-of-life considerations.
The name is a reference to Tom LaStrange, the inventor of the TWM window manager, which served as the main inspiration for the desktop theme. Other influences include printed paper, the Athena widget library and the Amiga Workbench
